_header: When John the Baptist Zachary son
_description: Gospel for Friday after Third Sunday in Lent, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: When Ion þe baptist zacari sunThurgh herod was in preson done…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þus calles crist man saul ogainIf it haue bene with sins slain
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Oportebat ihesum transire per samariam.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia vi post terciam dominicam quadragesime Secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 50rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.76-90.
